summary: A product/shopping app with premium access codes, sound settings, and product quantity measurement features. Users can access premium products with codes, change sound settings, and specify product quantities with unit selectors (gram/kg/liter) that adapt to the app language (Bengali/English).
architectural_notes: App supports bilingual display (Bengali/English); UI elements like unit selectors should respect the active language setting
known_issues: Quantity/measurement field only accepts numeric input; unit labels (kg, gram) cannot be typed — unit selector dropdown needed

existing_features.title: Redesign the sound toggle/change button in the Settings page with a new visually appropriate design. The button should clearly communicate its function (sound control) through iconography and styling. Replace the existing button UI with the new design while preserving the underlying sound enable/disable and custom sound upload functionality from useClickSound.ts.

Replace the previously planned premium access codes 987789 and 879987 with 4 new well-designed codes in PremiumModal.tsx. All 4 new codes must work exactly like the existing code 987987 — granting full premium access when entered. The original code 987987 must remain valid. Generate the 4 new codes following a consistent, memorable pattern.

Add a unit selector to quantity/measurement input fields in the AddSale page and ProductList page. Next to each quantity input field, display a small icon/button. Clicking this icon opens a dropdown with unit options: gram, kg, liter. The displayed unit labels must respect the current app language — showing Bengali labels (গ্রাম, কেজি, লিটার) when Bengali is active, and English labels (gram, kg, liter) when English is active, using the existing LanguageContext and translations system. The selected unit should be stored alongside the quantity value.
Add translation keys for the unit selector options (gram, kg, liter in both English and Bengali) to the translations object in frontend/src/locales/translations.ts.

new_feature_requests.summary: Redesign the sound button with a new improved design suitable for its function
Add 4 new premium access codes (replacing user-provided codes 987789 and 879987 with better designed ones plus 2 additional codes), all functioning like the existing 987987 code
Add a unit selector icon next to quantity fields; clicking it shows a dropdown with gram/kg/liter options displayed in Bengali or English based on the app language setting
